Testemunhos.title: Testimonials from our clients
Testemunhos.description: Each key carries a story, each home welcomes a dream, these are the voices of those who found their perfect place.

testimonial1.text: Vânia is wonderful, she knows the market where she operates very well and assists from property search to final details. Super important to have a trustworthy person always willing to help. We recommend 100%!
testimonial1.name: Lucimara Bordignon Borghetti

testimonial2.text: Agência Douro made all the difference in the sale of my home. The sale happened super fast. Vânia Fernandes, owner of the Agency, super friendly and competent, was always ready to answer my questions. I always recommend.
testimonial2.name: Maria Oliveira

testimonial3.text: Great differentiated service from all the real estate agencies I knew in Porto. Ethics, commitment, getting to know the company, for me it was a gift from heaven. Congratulations Agência Douro. Congratulations entrepreneur Vânia Fernandes!
testimonial3.name: Walter Martins

SobreNos.title: About Us
SobreNos.subtitle: Luxury Real Estate Specialists in Portugal
SobreNos.description1: At Agência Douro, our mission is to turn dreams into reality, always with an unwavering commitment to transparency and responsibility. Our team consists of highly qualified professionals, ready to help you realize the dream of your life.
SobreNos.description2: Operating in the national and international market, Agência Douro is recognized for its transparency, responsibility and commitment to providing peace of mind in every transaction. Whether for own housing or investment, we offer complete support to ensure your business is safe and effective.

excellence.title: Excellence
excellence.description: We believe in excellence as a standard, transparency as the basis of trust and integrity as a non-negotiable principle.

dedication.title: Dedication
dedication.description: We value personalized and dedicated service, recognizing that each client has unique needs.

innovation.title: Innovation
innovation.description: Innovation and adaptation to market needs are pillars of our culture, allowing us to always offer the best possible service.

legalConsulting.title: Legal Consulting
legalConsulting.description: We ensure that all real estate transactions are carried out safely and in accordance with current legislation.

mortgageConsulting.title: Mortgage Consulting
mortgageConsulting.description: We help you find the best financing options, suited to your needs and financial profile.

realEstatePromotion.title: Real Estate Promotion
realEstatePromotion.description: We help you find the best financing options, suited to your needs and financial profile.

SobreNos.teamDescription: Our team consists of highly qualified and experienced professionals, dedicated to providing the best service and turning your dreams into reality.

Podcast.title: Agência Douro Podcast
Podcast.subtitle: Conversations about the Luxury Real Estate Market in Portugal
Podcast.description: A podcast dedicated to discussing trends, challenges and opportunities in Portugal's luxury real estate market, with the participation of experts and professionals in the sector. The Agência Douro Podcast offers practical insights and inspiring content for investors, brokers and those interested in real estate and business, being a reliable source of information about the Portuguese sector.

marketTrends.title: Market Trends
marketTrends.description: In-depth analysis of current trends in Portugal's luxury real estate market and investment opportunities.

investmentTips.title: Investment Tips
investmentTips.description: Practical advice on how to invest in luxury properties, from choosing the location to appreciation strategies.

internationalVision.title: International Vision
internationalVision.description: Perspectives on foreign investors in Portugal and comparisons with other international markets.

Podcast.episodesDescription: Check out our most watched episodes and stay up to date with the conversations that are transforming the luxury real estate market.

apresentadora.label: Host
apresentadora.description: Vânia Fernandes is a recognized professional in the real estate sector in Northern Portugal, with over 15 years of experience in residential and commercial properties. As host of the Norte Imobiliário & Business Podcast, she shares knowledge, trends and strategies for buyers, sellers and investors in the Portuguese real estate market.
apresentadora.imageAlt: Vânia Fernandes - Real Estate Consultant & Host
